text: 10:25 Matyu 9:34; Mak 3:22; Luk 11:15Eghtɨ suren gumazim uan tisan mɨn otoghɨva, egh deragham. Egh ingangarir gumazim uan ekiamɨn mɨn otoghɨva, a uaghan deragham. Me ziar kam Belsebul isa dɨpenimɨn ghuavim gatɨ, ezɨ e kamaghɨn fo, me uaghan bar ziar kuraba da isɨva an adarazir arɨgham.”10:25 Ziam Belsebul, a Satanɨn ziar mam. Nɨ Matyu 12:22-28ɨn gan.
